Title: Save Tomothy
Description: <Miral looks at you expectantly then looks at the ruins, then back to you, then to the ruins. You get the sense she wants you to go over there. Perhaps this is where Tomothy got lost?>
ObjectivesText: Save Tomothy Hillhelm from The Grasping Darkness.
PortraitGiverText: Save Tomothy Hillhelm from the Grasping Darkness.
RewardText: You saved my idiot brother from the darkness! Thank you.
